title: i work in tech support for verizon. my customer has a google pixel 3, as of a few days ago while cha
content: when booting up the phone it pauses on the google logo screen 3 to 5 minutes before completing. the phone has plenty of memory and latest os. also a pop up keeps appearing that says "system ui is not working" and the phone will no longer vibrate. we did a factory data reset, after the first test call the screen went black & we haven't been able to get phone to respond since///  please help
